results.name: n-th run has length n.
comment: Seen as a triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = n mod 2, 1<=k<=n. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 18 2011
Row sums give A193356. - _Omar E. Pol_, Mar 05 2014
reference: K. H. Rosen, Discrete Mathematics and its Applications, 1999, Fourth Edition, page 79, exercise 10 (g).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n=1..125 of triangle, flattened
formula: a(n) = (1-(-1)^A002024(n))/2, where A002024(n)=round(sqrt(2*n)). - Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)hotmail.com), Feb 23 2003
Also a(n) = A000035(A002024(n)) = A002024(n) mod 2 = A002024(n)-2*floor(A002024(n)/2). - Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)hotmail.com), Feb 23 2003
